extendedInfo.description: Rediscover a sensual new world of lovemaking and erotic adventures with your significant other with A+ Happy Sex Position. Download this sexy and informative Kamasutra-based dictionary today to learn about new erotic techniques and innovative lovemaking positions. Created to teach users new exotic poses en route to developing their sex lives, A+ Happy Sex Position offers vibrant yet tasteful visual aides and animations to guide even the weariest of lovers toward discovering the full potential of their sexual chemistry.The user is given the option of browsing through a diverse portfolio of sex positions once in the app. Every unique position is visually explained via colorful animations that are carefully produced to omit possible gratuitous content. Furthermore, each sexy pose is playfully and creatively titled.A+ Happy Sex Position is an erotic yet unobtrusive learning app that is at once informative and highly entertaining. Designed to be practical and easily understandable, the app makes even the most complex sexual positions simple to master. If you're ready to take the next step in your sex life or simply want to add some spice to an existing relationship this app is a must-get. A+ Happy Sex Position features' include un-lockable positions, crisp animation, and optional audio support. Don't wait, download A+ Happy Sex Position today and be ready to pleasantly surprise your lover tonight.FeaturesUn-lockable positionsBGM on/off option

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: Full of adverts and actually can\'t see anything for more than half a second... There are better apps than this stay away from this one
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spam Trap
reviews.comment: This is a scam. There is no way to get past the ads. As far as I can tell there is no actual content.
